mapper.select: SELECT B.ALLOC_ID ,B.ALLOC_NO ,B.VHC_ID ,B.SEC_VHC_ID ,B.WAY_DIV ,B.WAY_DIV ,WD.DL_CD_NM WAY_DIV_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(B.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,D.VHC_NO ,A.VHC_NO AS SEC_VHC_NO ,E.COMP_NM ,F.COMP_NM AS SEC_COMP_NM ,H.DRV_ID ,H.SEC_DRV_ID ,H.THR_DRV_ID ,(SELECT DRV_NM FROM BMS_DRV_MST WHERE DRV_ID = H.DRV_ID) DRV_NM ,(SELECT DRV_NM FROM BMS_DRV_MST WHERE DRV_ID = H.SEC_DRV_ID) SEC_DRV_NM ,(SELECT DRV_NM FROM BMS_DRV_MST WHERE DRV_ID = H.THR_DRV_ID) THR_DRV_NM ,H.SEC_TRAN_TM ,H.THR_TRAN_TM FROM BMS_DAY_ALLOC_PL_INFO B LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST D ON B.VHC_ID = D.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST A ON B.SEC_VHC_ID = A.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST E ON D.COMP_ID = E.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST F ON A.COMP_ID = F.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DAY_DRV_ALLOC_INFO H ON B.ALLOC_ID = H.ALLOC_ID AND B.ALLOC_NO = H.ALLOC_NO AND B.OPER_DT = H.OPER_DT LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO WD ON B.WAY_DIV= WD.DL_CD AND WD.CO_CD = 'WAY_DIV' WHERE B.ALLOC_ID = #{ALLOC_ID} AND (B.OPER_DT BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}) ORDER BY B.OPER_DT, B.ALLOC_ID, B.ALLOC_NO
